Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;beer^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Cheers! Now that you can make your own beer, your life is one step closer to perfection.
It's ^blue;beer time^white;! Go to your ^orange;Fermenter^white; to make ^green;3 Beer^white;. You'll need 1 Wort, 2 Hops, 2 Wheat, 1 Yeast Water and 1 Empty Bottle.
